key.name: put-pointer-key
key.description: Move window to the pointer position

key.description: Move window to the pointer position

key.name: put-next-output-key
key.description: Move window to the next output device

key.name: put-previous-output-key
key.description: Move window to the previous output device

key.name: pad-left
key.description: Number of pixels from the left edge where the window will come to rest (0 - 500)

key.name: pad-right
key.description: Number of pixels from the right edge where the window will come to rest (0 - 500)

key.name: pad-top
key.description: Number of pixels from the top edge where the window will come to rest (0 - 500)

key.name: pad-bottom
key.description: Number of pixels from the bottom edge where the window will come to rest (0 - 500)

key.name: unfocus-window
key.description: Unfocus windows that are moved off the viewport

key.name: window-center
key.description: Put pointer uses the center of the window

key.name: avoid-offscreen
key.description: Avoids putting window borders offscreen

key.name: speed
key.description: Animation speed (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: timestep
key.description: Animation timestep (0.1 - 50.0)
